text: Surender Kumar (born 23 November 1993) is an Indian field hockey player, who plays as a defender for the Indian national team. He was part of the national team that participated in the 2016 Summer Olympics. He is from Karnal, Haryana. ==See also== *India at the 2016 Summer Olympics ==References== ==External links== *Profile at Hockey India * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Male field hockey defenders Category:Field hockey players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Field hockey players at the 2018 Asian Games Category:2018 Men's Hockey World Cup players Category:Olympic field hockey players of India Category:Indian male field hockey players Category:Field hockey players from Haryana Category:People from Karnal district Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for India Category:Asian Games medalists in field hockey Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Hockey India League players Category:Delhi Waveriders players
title: Surender Kumar
